get.description: Task information need to specify the name of the task before they can get to the task information.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Get the name of the task information.

get.description: Additional or update task, if the task is not included in this section task to add, or update an existing task.

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: Define the execution date, the default is the current date.

parameters.name: day
parameters.description: The number of days of the task intervals

parameters.name: last
parameters.description: The task repeated execution duration, the maximum value of 1440, or 24 hours, in minutes.

parameters.name: method
parameters.description: The task requests mode, request to get mode by default.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Define a task name, he must be unique.

parameters.name: run
parameters.description: The need to request the network address, usually a URL address.

parameters.name: space
parameters.description: The task repeat the interval length, minutes, and 0 means no Repeat.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Task type, task type: RunOnce (Executive), the Run Daily (performed on a daily basis), RunWeekly (weekly), RunMonthly (monthly execution).
